headline: PPG Industries Inc (NYSE:PPG) Offers a Dependable Dividend Backed by Strong Profitability
summary: PPG Industries offers a reliable 2.29% dividend yield with a decade of consistent growth, backed by strong profitability and solid financial health for income-focused investors.
